Head: Neuralgic pain, as if torn by pincers; involves face and teeth; worse, eating; better, cold; alternate with gastralgia
Pressure in occiput; worse, motion; with heaviness
Headache alternates with gastralgia
Cutting or pressure above right orbit extending to occiput
Respiratory: Angina pectoris; pain around heart, left arm to fingers
Pinching in middle of diaphragm, extending transversely through chest
Stomach: Will eat for several days; then vomit
Vomits, with convulsive gagging and pain
Better, cold drinks, but vomiting when stomach becomes full
Gastralgia; pain from stomach through to spine
Water is vomited as soon as it reaches the stomach
Stool: Painless diarrhoea, with great thirst, and frequent micturition and vomiting
Pinching in lower abdomen, with rumbling
Sleep: Sleepy in morning, a few hours after eating
Restless on account of voluptuous dreams
Mouth: Pressure as from a load in one spot, alternating with burning, crampy pain and pyrosis
Tongue coated white; sweetish, metallic taste
Inexpressible pain in stomach; must bend backwards
Toothache; better, cold water in mouth  tongue white
Black, gangrenous looking wedges on dorsum and sides of tongue
Extremities: Itching erosion near tibia and back of feet near joints
Tearing in tips of fingers under nails

name: Bismuthum
details: Irritation and catarrhal inflammation of the alimentary canal, is the chief action of this drug.
